name: UVertexBrushAlphaProperties
doc: Tool Properties for a brush alpha mask

Alpha: Alpha mask applied to brush stamp. Red channel is used.
RotationAngle: Alpha is rotated by this angle, inside the brush stamp frame (vertically aligned)
bRandomize: If true, a random angle in +/- RandomRange is added to Rotation angle for each stamp
RandomRange: Bounds of random generation (positive and negative) for randomized stamps
